mapper.sql:
select DISTINCT mo.id as id,-- 集成平台Id mo.cycle as cycle,-- 是否是维保周期任务工单:0 是 1 不是
mo.remark as remark,-- 备注信息 mo.sign as sign,-- 维保签字信息 mo.staff_info as staff_info,-- 维保人员电话备注信息 mo.handle_time as handle_time,-- 维保处理时间 mo.logic_remove as logic_remove,-- 是否逻辑删除 mo.order_state as order_state,-- 工单状态 mo.organization_id as organization_id,-- 机构表Id，用于区分平台 case when mp.cycle_type is null then mpj.project_type else mp.cycle_type end as project_type ,-- 保养类型 ei.`name` as device_name, -- 设备信息名称 CONCAT(IFNULL(ri.name,''),IFNULL(rp.name,''),IFNULL(rc.name,''),IFNULL(rs.name,''),IFNULL(rb.name,'')) AS address, case when mc.`name` is null then mcj.`name` else mc.`name` end as company_name ,-- 维保公司名称 case when mp.start_time is null then mpj.begin_date else mp.start_time end as plan_date -- 计划时间
FROM maintenance_order mo FROM maintenance_order mo left join maintenance_periodic mp on mp.id = mo.plan_id left join system_organization so on so.id = mo.organization_id left join equipment_info ei on ei.id = mo.device_id LEFT JOIN region_computer_room rr ON ei.machine_room_id = rr.id left join region_info ri on ri.id = mp.region_id left join region_project rp on rp.id = mp.project_id LEFT JOIN region_court rc ON rr.court_id = rc.id LEFT JOIN region_street rs ON rr.street_id = rs.id LEFT JOIN region_building rb ON rr.building_id = rb.id left join maintenance_company mc on mc.id = mp.company_id
left join maintenance_plan mpj on mpj.id = mo.plan_id left join region_info rij on ri.id = mp.region_id left join region_project rpj on rp.id = mp.project_id left join maintenance_company mcj on mcj.id = mpj.company_id
